usage.cn: 爱情是无形燃烧的火焰。
usage.eng: Love is a fire which burns unseen.

usage.cn: 你的吻还在我的唇上发烫，从此我的日子变得如此美丽。
usage.eng: Your kiss still burns on my lips, everyday of mine is so beautiful.

usage.cn: 无垠的沙漠热烈追求一叶绿草的爱，她摇摇头笑着飞开了。
usage.eng: the mighty desert is burning for the love of a blade of grass who shakes her head and laughs and flies away.
